name: Anvilwrought Raptor
languages: understands one language of its creator but can't speak

traits.Keen Sight: The raptor has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
traits.Recorded Mimicry: The raptor can mimic any sound, including voices, it has heard in the last 24 hours. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 12+1d4 + 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.Multiattack: The raptor makes two attacks with its beak.
actions.Beak: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
